summary:
NOT NEEDED ANYMORE - FIXED IN LATEST USKP
A simple bug fix for the persuasion of Brother Verulus when doing the "Taste Of Death" Quest.
descriptionHtml:
NOT NEEDED ANYMORE - FIXED IN LATEST USKP
[url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/Unofficial%20Skyrim%20Patch%20Version%20History.html]Brother Verulus cannot be persuaded to follow the player in Taste of Death (DA11) because the speech check was being done on the wrong target. (Bug #18667)[/url]




This should fix the problem of persuasion always failing with Brother Verulus when doing the "Taste Of Death" Quest.
The condition was checking if Verulus himself met the Speechcraft requirements. I simply changed it to check if the player fulfills the requirements.
It's a bit weird that this wasn't fixed yet with the USKP. I didn't find any other file that fixed this bug.

If you want to include this file in any compilation of bug fixes, go right ahead.
author: Solcom
